desc: Looking for the Original China Rain? It's here! The infamous Berkeley Classic Fragrance is back. Many of the nostalgic fragrances born at the Original Body Shop(eventually Body Time)have been gathered here, for you again! Buy the China Rain Perfume Oil, China Rain Shower Gel, China Rain Body Spray, China Rain soap!

layout.text: The old Berkeley tradition from the 1970's is here.  The nostalgia and romance of days gone by, in a fragrance!
